# Solving matematical optimization problems {#mod-vba-solver}

VBA can be used to setup the _Solver_ Add-in in Excel. For instance, this may be useful if you have to solve a set of linear programming problems or setup the model for different datasets. More info about this can be found in Chapter 17 in @vba-book.
